blocks.content: Define the Taylor polynomial or Taylor series of a function. TODO-AV: ` n e. ( NN0 u. { +oo } ) ` should be replaced by ` n e. NN0* ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2016.)

axiom df-tayl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(ctayl, cmpo(s0, s1, cpr(cr, cc), co(cc, cpm, cv(s0)), cmpo(s2, s3, cun(cn0, csn(cpnf)), ciin(s4, cin(co(nat0, cicc, cv(s2)), cz), cdm(cfv(co(cv(s0), cdvn, cv(s1)), cv(s4)))), ciun(s5, cc, cxp(csn(cv(s5)), co(ccnfld, ctsu, cmpt(s4, cin(co(nat0, cicc, cv(s2)), cz), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(cv(s0), cdvn, cv(s1)), cv(s4)), cv(s3)), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s4))), cmul, co(co(cv(s5), cmin, cv(s3)), cexp, cv(s4))))))))))
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
}

axiom df-tayl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ‚ä¢ Tayl =(s0 ‚àà { ‚Ñù, ‚ÑÇ }, s1 ‚àà(‚ÑÇ[p‚Ü¶]s0)‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñï0 ‚ãÉ { +‚àû }), s3 ‚àà ‚ãÇ(s4 ‚àà((0[[,]]s2)‚ãÇ ‚Ñ§), dom(((s0[Dn]s1)` s4)))‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ(s5 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ,({ s5 } √ó(CCfld[tsums](s4 ‚àà((0[[,]]s2)‚ãÇ ‚Ñ§)‚Ü¶(((((s0[Dn]s1)` s4)` s3)[√∑](! ` s4))[√ó]((s5[-]s3)[^]s4))))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
}

blocks.name: df-ana
blocks.content: Define the set of analytic functions, which are functions such that the Taylor series of the function at each point converges to the function in some neighborhood of the point. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Dec-2016.)

thm taylfvallem1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))), wcel(co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0)), c4), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, c4), cexp, cv(s0))), cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cpr(cr, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c3, c5, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c5, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wo(wcel(c1, cn0), wceq(c1, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))), wcel(c4, cdm(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))), wcel(co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0)), c4), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, c4), cexp, cv(s0))), cc)), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))), wcel(co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0)), c4), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, c4), cexp, cv(s0))), cc)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))), wcel(co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0)), c4), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, c4), cexp, cv(s0))), cc)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))), wcel(co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0)), c4), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, c4), cexp, cv(s0))), cc)), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))), wcel(co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0)), c4), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, c4), cexp, cv(s0))), cc)), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))), wcel(co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0)), c4), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, c4), cexp, cv(s0))), cc)), diffsw(s0, w0))
  mulcld(co(cfv(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0)), c4), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), co(co(c0, cmin, c4), cexp, cv(s0)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))))
  divcld(cfv(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0)), c4), cfv(cfa, cv(s0)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))))
  ffvelrnd(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0)), c4, cc, cdm(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0))), wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))), wf(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0)), cdm(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0))), cc), wcel(c2, cpr(cr, cc)), wcel(c3, co(cc, cpm, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cn0))
  dvnf(c2, c3, cv(s0))
  nncnd(cfv(cfa, cv(s0)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))))
  nnne0d(cfv(cfa, cv(s0)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))))
  faccld(cv(s0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))))
  expcld(co(c0, cmin, c4), cv(s0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))))
  subcld(c0, c4, wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))))
  simplr(w0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz)))
  sseldd(c4, cc, cdm(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0))), wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))))
  sstrd(cdm(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0))), cc, c5, wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))))
  fssdmd(cdm(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0))), c5, c3, cc, wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz)), wf(c3, c5, cc))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))), wss(cdm(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0))), cdm(c3)), wcel(c2, cpr(cr, cc)), wcel(c3, co(cc, cpm, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cn0))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz)), wcel(c2, cpr(cr, cc)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz)), wcel(c3, co(cc, cpm, c2)))
  syl22anc(w0, wcel(c3, co(cc, cpm, c2)), wcel(cc, universe), wcel(c2, cpr(cr, cc)), wf(c3, c5, cc), wss(c5, c2))
  a1i(w0, wcel(cc, universe))
  cnex()
  elpm2r(cc, universe, c2, cpr(cr, cc), c3, c5)
  dvnbss(c2, c3, cv(s0))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz)), wss(c5, cc))
  sstrd(c5, cc, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c2, cc), wcel(c2, cpr(cr, cc)))
  recnprss(c2)
  adantlr(w0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz)), wcel(c4, cdm(cfv(co(c2, cdvn, c3), cv(s0)))))
  sylanbrc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))), wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)))
  elin2d(cv(s0), cz, co(nat0, cicc, c1), wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))))
  simp2d(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))
  mpbid(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, c1)))
  elin1d(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz, wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz)))
  sylancr(wa(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cc)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz))), wb(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cicc, c1)), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cxr), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wcel(nat0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  0xr()
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c1), cz)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cxr), wo(wcel(c1, cn0), wceq(c1, cpnf)))
  jaoi(wcel(c1, cn0), wceq(c1, cpnf), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexrd(c1, wcel(c1, cn0))
  nn0re(c1)
  syl6eqel(c1, cxr, cpnf, wceq(c1, cpnf))
  id(wceq(c1, cpnf))
  pnfxr()

blocks.name: taylfval
blocks.content: Define the Taylor polynomial of a function. The constant ` Tayl ` is a function of five arguments: ` S ` is the base set with respect to evaluate the derivatives (generally ` RR ` or ` CC ` ), ` F ` is the function we are approximating, at point ` B ` , to order ` N ` . The result is a polynomial function of ` x ` . This "extended" version of ~ taylpfval additionally handles the case ` N = +oo ` , in which case this is not a polynomial but an infinite series, the Taylor series of the function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2016.)

blocks.content: Value of the Taylor series as a relation (elementhood in the domain here expresses that the series is convergent). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2016.)

thm eltayl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cpr(cr, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c5, c7, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c7, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wo(wcel(c3, cn0), wceq(c3, cpnf)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c3), cz))), wcel(c6, cdm(cfv(co(c4, cdvn, c5), cv(s0)))))

  3bitr3g(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, co(ccnfld, ctsu, cmpt(s0, cin(co(nat0, cicc, c3), cz), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c4, cdvn, c5), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, c6), cexp, cv(s0))))))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), c1), wcel(cop(c0, c2), ciun(hs0, cc, cxp(csn(cv(hs0)), co(ccnfld, ctsu, cmpt(s0, cin(co(nat0, cicc, c3), cz), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c4, cdvn, c5), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c6), cexp, cv(s0)))))))))

  alrimiv(hs1, w0, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), co(ccnfld, ctsu, cmpt(s0, cin(co(nat0, cicc, c4), cz), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c1, cdvn, c2), cv(s0)), c5), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5), cexp, cv(s0)))))))))
  biimpd(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), co(ccnfld, ctsu, cmpt(s0, cin(co(nat0, cicc, c4), cz), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c1, cdvn, c2), cv(s0)), c5), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5), cexp, cv(s0))))))))

blocks.name: tayl0
blocks.content: The Taylor series is always defined at the basepoint, with value equal to the value of the function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: taylpfval
blocks.content: Define the Taylor polynomial of a function. The constant ` Tayl ` is a function of five arguments: ` S ` is the base set with respect to evaluate the derivatives (generally ` RR ` or ` CC ` ), ` F ` is the function we are approximating, at point ` B ` , to order ` N ` . The result is a polynomial function of ` x ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: taylpf
blocks.content: The Taylor polynomial is a function on the complex numbers (even if the base set of the original function is the reals). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm taylpf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(c0, cc, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cpr(cr, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, c3, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c3, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cdm(cfv(co(c1, cdvn, c2), c4))))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c4, co(c1, ctayl, c2), c5))
} = {
  fmpt3d(hs0, c0, cc, cc, csu(hs1, co(nat0, cfz, c4), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c1, cdvn, c2), cv(hs1)), c5), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs1))), cmul, co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5), cexp, cv(hs1)))), w0)
  taylpfval(hs0, hs1, c0, c4, c1, c2, c5, c3, w0)
  fsumcl(hs1, co(nat0, cfz, c4), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c1, cdvn, c2), cv(hs1)), c5), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(hs1))), cmul, co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5), cexp, cv(hs1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cc)))
  fzfid(nat0, c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cc)))
  taylplem2(hs1, cv(hs0), c4, c1, c2, c5, c3, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(co(nat0, cfz, c4))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cc)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
}

thm taylpf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà { ‚Ñù, ‚ÑÇ })
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c2 : c3 ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚äÜ c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà ‚Ñï0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà dom(((c1[Dn]c2)` c4)))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(c4[(c1[Tayl]c2)]c5)
} = {
  fmpt3d(hs0, c0, cc, cc, sum(hs1 ‚àà(0[...]c4),(((((c1[Dn]c2)` hs1)` c5)[√∑](! ` hs1))[√ó]((hs0[-]c5)[^]hs1))), w0)
  taylpfval(hs0, hs1, c0, c4, c1, c2, c5, c3, w0)
  fsumcl(hs1, (0[...]c4), (((((c1[Dn]c2)` hs1)` c5)[√∑](! ` hs1))[√ó]((hs0[-]c5)[^]hs1)), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  fzfid(nat0, c4, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  taylplem2(hs1, hs0, c4, c1, c2, c5, c3, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c((0[...]c4))
  diff.hs1.w((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
}

blocks.name: taylpval
blocks.content: Value of the Taylor polynomial. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm taylpval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c5), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(c1, cmin, c5), cexp, cv(s0))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cpr(cr, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c4, c6, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c6, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cdm(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c2))))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c2, co(c3, ctayl, c4), c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, c0, c1, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c5), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(c1, cmin, c5), cexp, cv(s0)))), cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c5), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5), cexp, cv(s0)))), universe, w0)
  taylpfval(hs0, s0, c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  sumeq2dv(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c5), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5), cexp, cv(s0))), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c5), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(c1, cmin, c5), cexp, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  oveq2d(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c5), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5), cexp, cv(s0)), co(co(c1, cmin, c5), cexp, cv(s0)), wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c2))))
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c5), cexp, cv(s0), co(c1, cmin, c5), wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c2))))
  oveq1d(cv(hs0), cmin, c5, c1, wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c2))))
  simplr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c2)))
  a1i(w0, wcel(csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c5), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(c1, cmin, c5), cexp, cv(s0)))), universe))
  sumex(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c5), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(c1, cmin, c5), cexp, cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c5), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(c1, cmin, c5), cexp, cv(s0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cfz, c2)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: taylply2
blocks.content: The Taylor polynomial is a polynomial of degree (at most) ` N ` . This version of ~ taylply shows that the coefficients of ` T ` are in a subring of the complex numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm taylply2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c0), cle, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cpr(cr, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c4, c5, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c5, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cdm(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c2))))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c2, co(c3, ctayl, c4), c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c2))), wcel(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  jca(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c0), cle, c2))
  eqeltrd(c0, cfv(cply, c1), ccom(cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0))))), co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6)))), w0)
  plyco(hs2, hs3, cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0))))), co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6))), c1, w0)
  eqbrtrd(cfv(cdgr, c0), cle, c2, cfv(cdgr, cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0)))))), w0)
  3eqtrd(cfv(cdgr, c0), cfv(cdgr, cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0)))))), cfv(cdgr, ccom(cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0))))), co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6))))), co(cfv(cdgr, cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0)))))), cmul, cfv(cdgr, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6))))), w0)
  fveq2d(cdgr, c0, ccom(cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0))))), co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6)))), w0)
  eqtr4d(c0, ccom(cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0))))), co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6)))), cmpt(hs1, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(cv(hs1), cmin, c6), cexp, cv(s0))))), w0)
  taylpfval(hs1, s0, c0, c2, c3, c4, c6, c5, w0)
  fmptco(hs1, hs0, cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0))))), co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6))), cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(cv(hs1), cmin, c6), cexp, cv(s0)))), co(cv(hs1), cmin, c6), cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0)))), w0)
  subcld(cv(hs1), c6, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cc)))
  offval2(hs1, cidp, cmin, cxp(cc, csn(c6)), cc, cv(hs1), c6, universe, cc, cc, w0)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cc))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(c6, cc))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cidp, cmpt(hs1, cc, cv(hs1))))
  eqtr4i(cidp, cmpt(hs1, cc, cv(hs1)), cres(cid, cc))
  df-idp()
  mptresid(hs1, cc)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cxp(cc, csn(c6)), cmpt(hs1, cc, c6)))
  fconstmpt(hs1, cc, c6)
  sumeq2sdv(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0))), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(co(cv(hs1), cmin, c6), cexp, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cmin, c6)))
  oveq2d(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0)), co(co(cv(hs1), cmin, c6), cexp, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cmin, c6)))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), cmin, c6), cexp, cv(s0))
  dgrco(cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0))))), co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6))), cfv(cdgr, cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0)))))), cfv(cdgr, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6)))), c1, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cdgr, cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0)))))))
  eqid(cfv(cdgr, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6)))))
  plysub(hs2, hs3, cidp, cxp(cc, csn(c6)), c1, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cidp, cfv(cply, c1)), wss(c1, cc), wcel(nat1, c1))
  plyid(c1)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cxp(cc, csn(c6)), cfv(cply, c1)), wss(c1, cc), wcel(c6, c1))
  plyconst(c1, c6)
  sylan(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs3), c1)), wcel(co(cv(hs2), caddc, cv(hs3)), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)))
  3expb(wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)), wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs3), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs2), caddc, cv(hs3)), c1))
  subgcl(c1, ccnfld, cv(hs2), cv(hs3), caddc)
  cnfldadd()
  sylan(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs3), c1)), wcel(co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs3)), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  3expb(wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs3), c1), wcel(co(cv(hs2), cmul, cv(hs3)), c1))
  subrgmcl(c1, ccnfld, cv(hs2), cv(hs3), cmul)
  cnfldmul()
  syl5eqelr(cneg(nat1), c1, cfv(cfv(cminusg, ccnfld), nat1), w0)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, ccnfld), nat1), cneg(nat1)), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ax-1cn()
  cnfldneg(nat1)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, ccnfld), nat1), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)), wcel(nat1, c1))
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  subrgsubg(c1, ccnfld)
  syl(w0, wcel(nat1, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  subrg1cl(c1, ccnfld, nat1)
  cnfld1()
  subginvcl(c1, ccnfld, nat1, cfv(cminusg, ccnfld))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, ccnfld))
  eqtrd(co(cfv(cdgr, cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0)))))), cmul, cfv(cdgr, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6))))), cfv(cdgr, cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0)))))), co(cfv(cdgr, cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0)))))), cmul, nat1), w0)
  oveq2d(cfv(cdgr, cmpt(hs0, cc, csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), co(co(cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), cv(s0)), c6), cdiv, cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cmul, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s0)))))), cmul, cfv(cdgr, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6)))), nat1, w0)
  simp2d(w0, wceq(cfv(cdgr, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6)))), nat1), wcel(co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6))), cfv(cply, cc)), wceq(cima(ccnv(co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6)))), csn(nat0)), csn(c6)))
  syl(w0, w3a(wcel(co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6))), cfv(cply, cc)), wceq(cfv(cdgr, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6)))), nat1), wceq(cima(ccnv(co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c6)))), csn(nat0)), csn(c6))), wcel(c6, cc))
  sseldd(c6, cc, cdm(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c2)), w0)
  sstrd(cdm(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c2)), cc, c5, w0)
  fssdmd(cdm(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c2)), c5, c4, cc, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wss(cdm(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c2)), cdm(c4)), wcel(c3, cpr(cr, cc)), wcel(c4, co(cc, cpm, c3)), wcel(c2, cn0))
  dvnbss(c3, c4, c2)
  sstrd(c5, cc, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(c3, cc), wcel(c3, cpr(cr, cc)))
  recnprss(c3)

blocks.content: The ` M ` -th derivative of the Taylor polynomial is the Taylor polynomial of the ` M ` -th derivative of the function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: dvntaylp0
blocks.content: The first ` N ` derivatives of the Taylor polynomial at ` B ` match the derivatives of the function from which it is derived. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvntaylp0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(co(cc, cdvn, c0), c1), c2), cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1), c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cpr(cr, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c4, c5, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c5, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c6))))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c6, co(c3, ctayl, c4), c2))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cfv(co(cc, cdvn, c0), c1), c2), cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1), c2), cfv(co(co(c6, cmin, c1), co(c3, ctayl, cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1)), c2), c2), w0)
  fveq1d(cfv(co(cc, cdvn, c0), c1), c2, co(co(c6, cmin, c1), co(c3, ctayl, cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1)), c2), w0)
  eqtr3d(cfv(co(cc, cdvn, c0), c1), co(co(c6, cmin, c1), co(c3, ctayl, cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1)), c2), cfv(co(cc, cdvn, co(co(co(c6, cmin, c1), caddc, c1), co(c3, ctayl, c4), c2)), c1), w0)
  fveq1d(co(cc, cdvn, co(co(co(c6, cmin, c1), caddc, c1), co(c3, ctayl, c4), c2)), c1, co(cc, cdvn, c0), w0)
  oveq2d(cc, cdvn, co(co(co(c6, cmin, c1), caddc, c1), co(c3, ctayl, c4), c2), c0, w0)
  syl6eqr(co(co(co(c6, cmin, c1), caddc, c1), co(c3, ctayl, c4), c2), c0, co(c6, co(c3, ctayl, c4), c2), w0)
  oveq1d(co(co(c6, cmin, c1), caddc, c1), co(c3, ctayl, c4), c2, c6, w0)
  dvntaylp(co(c6, cmin, c1), c1, c3, c4, c2, c5, w0)
  eleqtrrd(c2, cdm(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), co(co(c6, cmin, c1), caddc, c1))), cdm(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c6)), w0)
  dmeqd(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), co(co(c6, cmin, c1), caddc, c1)), cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c6), w0)
  fveq2d(co(c3, cdvn, c4), co(co(c6, cmin, c1), caddc, c1), c6, w0)
  npcand(c6, c1, w0)
  simprd(w0, wceq(cfv(co(co(c6, cmin, c1), co(c3, ctayl, cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1)), c2), c2), cfv(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1), c2)), wcel(c2, cdm(co(co(c6, cmin, c1), co(c3, ctayl, cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1)), c2))))
  tayl0(hs0, c2, co(co(c6, cmin, c1), co(c3, ctayl, cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1)), c2), cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1), c3, cdm(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1)), co(c6, cmin, c1), w0)
  orcd(w0, wcel(co(c6, cmin, c1), cn0), wceq(co(c6, cmin, c1), cpnf))
  taylplem1(hs0, co(c6, cmin, c1), c2, c3, cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1), cdm(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1)), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wf(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1), cdm(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1)), cc), wcel(c3, cpr(cr, cc)), wcel(c4, co(cc, cpm, c3)), wcel(c1, cn0))
  dvnf(c3, c4, c1)
  sstrd(cdm(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1)), c3, c5, w0)
  fssdmd(cdm(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1)), c5, c4, cc, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wss(cdm(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1)), cdm(c4)), wcel(c3, cpr(cr, cc)), wcel(c4, co(cc, cpm, c3)), wcel(c1, cn0))
  dvnbss(c3, c4, c1)
  eleqtrrd(c2, cdm(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1)), co(c6, cmin, c1))), cdm(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c6)), w0)
  dmeqd(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1)), co(c6, cmin, c1)), cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c6), w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1)), co(c6, cmin, c1)), cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c6), cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), co(c1, caddc, co(c6, cmin, c1))), w0)
  syl22anc(w0, wceq(cfv(co(c3, cdvn, cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), c1)), co(c6, cmin, c1)), cfv(co(c3, cdvn, c4), co(c1, caddc, co(c6, cmin, c1)))), wcel(c3, cpr(cr, cc)), wcel(c4, co(cc, cpm, c3)), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(co(c6, cmin, c1), cn0))
  syl22anc(w0, wcel(c4, co(cc, cpm, c3)), wcel(cc, universe), wcel(c3, cpr(cr, cc)), wf(c4, c5, cc), wss(c5, c3))
  a1i(w0, wcel(cc, universe))
  cnex()
  elpm2r(cc, universe, c3, cpr(cr, cc), c4, c5)
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c6, cmin, c1), cn0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c6)))
  fznn0sub(c1, nat0, c6)
  dvnadd(c3, c4, c1, co(c6, cmin, c1))
  fveq2d(co(c3, cdvn, c4), co(c1, caddc, co(c6, cmin, c1)), c6, w0)
  pncan3d(c1, c6, w0)
  nn0cnd(c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c6)))

blocks.name: taylthlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ taylth . This is the main part of Taylor's theorem, except for the induction step, which is supposed to be proven using L'Hôpital's rule. However, since our proof of L'Hôpital assumes that ` S = RR ` , we can only do this part generically, and for ~ taylth itself we must restrict to ` RR ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: taylth
blocks.content: Taylor's theorem. The Taylor polynomial of a ` N ` -times differentiable function is such that the error term goes to zero faster than ` ( x - B ) ^ N ` . This is Metamath 100 proof #35. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jan-2017.)
